section.8: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Narrated Ubayy ibn Ka'b: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to observe witr with (reciting) "Glorify the name of thy Lord, the most High" (Surah 87), "Say O disbelievers" (Surah 109), and "Say, He is Allah, the One, Allah, the eternally besought of all" (112)
